Deliverance from the Depths
PartyRosters

1 Cave Entrance

The cave mouth curves back into the darkness where an 8ft tall wooden pallisade has been constructed. There is a gate at the east end secured by a sliding bar.

  • DC 12 Wis (Perception) check 2 goblins on duty guarding the entrance from the pallisade.
  • DC 15 Wis (Perception) check 2 more goblins sitting behind the pallisade.
  • unless the alarm has been raised the goblins will not be alert
  • goblin passive perception 12, if alarm has not been raised use disadvantage -5

Deliverance from the Depths

  • Bob Greenshields

A desperate delve into an ancient cave system to rescue captives of a goblin warband
